entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure existing usages of InterceptsLocationAttribute are onboarded to the new checksum-based approach #72855
  • Make MetadataDisplayFormat public #72844

Closed

  • `where` is not suggested when adding the first type constraint to a local function #72821
    Backlog
  • Unintuitive diagnostic when missing `>` in type argument list #48566
    Backlog
  • Poor error recovery after missing > #24642
    Backlog
  • False positive for CS1503 with MSBuild 17.10, but not dotnet build #72098

PullRequests

Created

  • Recommend extensions with matching constraints when the extension type is the generic type parameter #72853
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add wait option to Replay #72852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move Replay tool to the proper folder in solution explorer #72846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Implement `do` snippet #72842
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Stop loading ISourceGenerators within VS entirely. #72835
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2420562 #72854
    auto-merge
  • Remove ability for a project to change its language #72847
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix MEF import of to allow null #72851
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72850
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use singular helper when creating checksums #72849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (#72273)" (#72827) #72845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add method name to TimeInQueue telemetry #72841
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2420199 #72843
    auto-merge
  • Revert "Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (#72273)" #72827
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Suggest `where` keyword in generic local function declarations #72838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move source-generators out of ProjectState and entirely into SolutinoCompilationState #72834
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove legacy TS EA api #72828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ServiceHub config for desktop host #72793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Print diagnostics in invariant culture (English error messages) in assert text #72816
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72856
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some crash dump tips for Linux #72719
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
